posts.title: A Virtual Art Exhibit and Q&A with Artist Stephen Galiczynski
posts.text: NYC-based Galiczynski shares his background, influences, and how he's been affected by the pandemic.

posts.title: The Fascinating & Gruesome History of Medicine: A Short Book List
posts.text: Explore the birth of germ theory, the ascent of forensic science, the evolution of two New York locales (Manhattan's Bellevue Hospital and Roosevelt Island), and some cures that turned out to be worse than the disease.

posts.title: True Crime Stories from the Victorian Era
posts.text: Sometimes truth is stranger (and more gruesome) than fiction.These titles delve into the lives and minds of killers, suspects, victims and investigators of some sensational and lesser-known nineteenth century murders.
